name: Bushi

ability.name: Brandish Blade
ability.description: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Iaigiri.

description: Its body becomes a blade upon death, to be taken up by the next generation. If someone other than a Bushi wields this blade, the soul within torments them until they are driven mad.

skills.name: Ignis Blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Iaigiri
skills.description: Bushi's exclusive skill. After Holding the sword, he appears in front of the enemy in an instant and unleashes a Ultra-fast sword draw attack.

skills.name: Ignis Breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts that electrocute the surrounding area.

skills.name: Ignis Rage
skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.
